name: Wooden Steak
description:
MUSIC BY THE INCREDIBLY TALENTED LOUIE ZONG, PLEASE SUPPORT HIM ON BANDCAMP !!! https://louiezong.bandcamp.com/track/capricious-carnival

All other assets by me.

---

How To Play:

Bring the 3 ingredients to the coffin, which is in the Green room. Pay attention to the room colors.

Walk with WASD, Bat-Boost with Left Click. Press M to mute music.

Your Bat-Boost renders you invisible for its duration, but it also makes a noise that causes nearby Chefs to investigate.
